name: Accordion
description: Collapsible content sections for organizing information in a compact, navigable format

accessibility.screenReader: Announces accordion headers with expanded/collapsed state. Each trigger is announced as a button with its heading text and aria-expanded state. Content regions are labeled by their associated headers.

recommendedUsage: Use for FAQ sections, settings panels, or any content that benefits from progressive disclosure. Ideal when users need to see multiple sections but not all at once.
antiPatterns: Do not use for primary navigation or critical content that must always be visible. Avoid deeply nested accordions.
